thread.title: Susie V
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Susie V

author: Susie V
title: Susie V
text: I stupidly bought the BBG 1 twice (when trying to buy BBG 2) so was so happy to get the BBG 2 and meal guide for $30 USD total. I think after all my purchases I didn't end up getting much of the discount but am so happy that the BBG 2 and meal guide (veg version) was available at a discount so I could get the one I really wanted. Link came immediately, definitely a legit deal. If you were considering the guide, it's been a great experience for me and this is the price to get it at!
